title: Any new incoming gragas skins?
body: i was wondering if anyone knows about any new gragas skins or is there not gonna be any for a while?

replies.body:
Its not really possible to know until either a teaser is released, or it hits PBE.
So there could be one in 1 week time, or it could be 4 years away. We have no way of knowing.

There was a list of skins _(and other content)_ that were leaked from Riot by someone. So far everything on that list has come true. But there was no Gragas skin on it.

Riot also announced that in the next 12 months, Cassiopeia, Yorick, Viktor and Illaoi are getting new skins. and while Gragas wasnt explicitly mentioned, they did say _"(and others)"_ so it is possible that Gragas could be included. But it hasn't been specifically mentioned.
http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/05/dev-state-of-skins/

Sorry I cant answer your question any more accurately.
He is in need of a good new skin in my opinion _(despite my hatred for the fat man)_. a 1350 one at least.
Ahhhh sweat. I've been waiting for a new illaoi skin.
You can get Fnatic Gragas (Legacy skin) for a limited time at the moment
